author: glasser
msg: Because the node origins table is just a cache, you should be able to
use operations that deal with it even if the repository is readonly to
you (for example, ra_local with restricted permissions).  Test this,
by splitting the node-origins-rev unit test into two tests, one of
which chmods the sqlite table to readonly first.
(node_origin_rev): Add a read_only parameter; if it's true, set
indexes.sqlite to readonly (and adjust test and repo name based
(test_funcs): Replace node_origin_rev with the ro version (XFAIL)

author: cmpilato
msg: More function/structure relocation and grouping.  No logic changes.

author: dlr
msg: "parentpath" (an svn_stringbuf_t), which was not properly setting
